name: Albedo
description: An alchemist based in Mondstadt, in the service of the Knights of Favonius.

skillTalents.name: Favonius Bladework - Weiss
skillTalents.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skillTalents.name: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
skillTalents.description:
Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance.
Solar Isotoma

When enemies within the Solar Isotoma zone are hit, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF.
Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s.
When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time.
Solar Isotoma is considered a Geo construct.

Hold to designate the location of the skill.

skillTalents.name: Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide
skillTalents.description:
Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing AoE Geo DMG in front of him.
If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing AoE Geo DMG
Tecotonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.

passiveTalents.name: Calcite Might
passiveTalents.description: Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma deal 25% more DMG to enemies whose HP is below 50%.

passiveTalents.name: Homuncular Nature
passiveTalents.description: Using Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.

passiveTalents.name: Flash of Genius
passiveTalents.description: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Flower of Eden
constellations.description: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

constellations.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
constellations.description:
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:

Each stack of Fatal Reckoning increases DMG by of Albedo's DEF.
The effect stacks up to 4 times.

Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning, increasing the DMG dealt by the Tectonic Tide and Fatal Blossoms based on the number of stacks consumed.

constellations.name: Grace of Helios
constellations.description:
Increases the level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Descent of Divinity
constellations.description: Solar Isotoma increases Plunging Attack DMG by 30% for active party members within the AoE.

constellations.name: Tide of Hadaen
constellations.description:
Increases the level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dust of Purification
constellations.description: If active party members within the AoE are protected by a shield created by Crystallize, Solar Isotoma increases their DMG by 17%.
